references.paper_title: Neural networks and physical systems with emergent collective computational abilities
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of Hopfield networks, which are central to the proposed method in the paper.

references.paper_title: Hopfield networks is all you need
references.reason: This paper introduces modern Hopfield networks (MHNs), which form the basis of the Hopfield Boosting algorithm.

references.paper_title: POEM: Out-of-distribution detection with posterior sampling
references.reason: This paper presents a state-of-the-art OOD detection method that uses outlier data, which Hopfield Boosting improves upon.

references.paper_title: Deep anomaly detection with outlier exposure
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of outlier exposure (OE), a training strategy that Hopfield Boosting uses to improve OOD detection.

references.paper_title: A decision-theoretic generalization of on-line learning and an application to boosting
references.reason: This paper introduces AdaBoost, a boosting algorithm which inspired the boosting approach used in Hopfield Boosting.
